transportAdvice: Johor Bahru has a limited public bus network that covers some areas, but taxis and ride-hailing services are the most practical options for getting around; walking is feasible in the city centre but less practical across the wider urban sprawl. The city is well connected to Singapore via the Causeway, with bus and rail links available for cross-border travel.
